agramathyaya sirimawo bandaranayaka mahathmiyage prajathanthriya lesin balayata path wunu rajaya, 1962 janawari 27 dina rathriyehi perala damimata boho kristhiyani jyeshta hamuda saha polis niladharin wisin salasum karana lada namuth, [1] kumanthranaya kriyathmaka kirimata pera, pradhana nayakayan athadanguwata ganna ladi.[2] 2 salasum kala kumanthranaya 3 prathipalaya 1948 di brithanyayen nidahasa dinagath lankawa, labuye dominiyan thaththwayaki (dominiyan lankawa).
